description: runtime: add link to design doc for new scheduler

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Is it possible to copy this document to golang.org/s/go11sched or something ?
(by the way, is there a list of golang.org/s/* documents?)

PTAL (changed to go11sched)

On Mon, Mar 4, 2013 at 7:12 AM, Rémy Oudompheng <remyoudompheng@gmail.com>wrote:

> Is it possible to copy this document to golang.org/s/go11sched or
> something ?
> (by the way, is there a list of golang.org/s/* documents?)
>

No, there isn't. It's just a URL shortener like you'd expect, though. The
only shortened docs.google.com URLs are go11func, go11return, and now
go11sched.

Russ

LGTM

On Mon, Mar 4, 2013 at 7:09 AM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:
